title: Computer Vision Pipeline for Rust Detection
summary: Real-time industrial rust detection system using deep learning.
description: Designed and deployed a real-time rust detection pipeline using YOLOv8. Built a custom dataset, optimized model performance, and exposed inference via Flask API for industrial usage.
challenges: Building and labeling a high-quality custom dataset
Balancing model accuracy and inference speed
impact: Achieved 94% mAP on custom dataset with real-time performance.

title: Time Series Forecasting with MLOps
summary: End-to-end ML pipeline for energy consumption prediction.
description: Built a full ML pipeline for forecasting energy consumption. Integrated Airflow scheduling, MLflow tracking, and deployed model using FastAPI for scalable prediction services.
impact: Delivered automated prediction workflow with monitoring and reproducibility.

title: Collaborative E-Vote Web Application
summary: Secure collaborative voting platform (Final Year Project).
description: Developed a full-stack e-voting application enabling secure user authentication, voting management, and real-time results display.
impact: Built secure authentication and database-driven voting logic.

title: Full-Stack E-Commerce Platform
summary: Complete e-commerce website with admin and product management.
description: Created a full-stack e-commerce system including product catalog, authentication, and admin dashboard using Laravel and Bootstrap.
impact: Implemented CRUD operations, authentication, and database integration.

title: Agentic AI Conversational System
summary: Conversational AI with reasoning and task execution capabilities.
description: Built an AI conversational system capable of multi-step reasoning and contextual dialogue using LLM integration techniques.
impact: Demonstrated multi-step reasoning and conversational memory.
